title: Sparky's magic piano
brief_description: Eight-year old Sparky hates to practise! One day his piano speaks to him and shows him what it is like to play the piano well - the piano will do it for him. Suddenly Sparky is hailed as a musical genius, but he becomes arrogant, rude to his family and the piano, so the piano refuses to play at the most important concert of his career … Voices include Mel Blanc, Coral Browne, Tony Curtis, Cloris Leachman and Vincent Price.
